column4: why is there so much unstable software in hardy, built as an lts?
i mean its far beyond reason to include ff3 in a stable release
LTS releases are future-facing, since the software is going to be in use for a long time.
If the beta software in Ubuntu doesn't live up to your expectations, just ask for a refund, no problem.
